tutorial.title: Learning the General TVM Buttons
tutorial.scenario:
These are the general buttons you will use to calculate a Time Value of Money equation. Remember, to enter a known value you will need to enter the numerical value first and then press the appropriate button.

Play
tutorial.step: Press the RESET button to clear all the previous entries.
Press the N button to set the number of periods/payments.
Press the I/Y button to set the periodic interest rate.
Press the PV button to set the starting balance, initial investment or present value.
Press the PMT button to set the payment or annuity amount.
Press the FV button to set the ending balance or future value.
Press the P/Y button to set the number of payments per year.
Press the BGN button to change the payments to beginning-of-period mode (red). Press this button again to return to the end-of-period mode (black).
Press the CPT button followed by the appropriate TVM button to solve for an unknown value.
